channel.title: Openai.com/Blog on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Openai.com/Blog on .NET Ramblings

item.title: OpenAI, Oracle, and SoftBank expand Stargate with five new AI datacenter sites
item.description: OpenAI, Oracle, and SoftBank announce five new Stargate AI datacenter sites, accelerating a $500B, 10-gigawatt U.S. infrastructure buildout to power next-generation AI and create tens of thousands of jobs. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/five-new-stargate-sites

item.title: Creating a safe, observable AI infrastructure for 1 million classrooms
item.description: Discover how SchoolAI, built on OpenAI’s GPT-4.1, image generation, and TTS, powers safe, teacher-guided AI tools for 1 million classrooms worldwide—boosting engagement, oversight, and personalized learning. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/schoolai

item.title: OpenAI and NVIDIA announce strategic partnership to deploy 10 gigawatts of NVIDIA systems
item.description: OpenAI and NVIDIA announce a strategic partnership to deploy 10 gigawatts of AI datacenters powered by NVIDIA systems, with the first phase launching in 2026. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/openai-nvidia-systems-partnership

item.title: Detecting and reducing scheming in AI models
item.description: Apollo Research and OpenAI developed evaluations for hidden misalignment (“scheming”) and found behaviors consistent with scheming in controlled tests across frontier models. The team shared concrete examples and stress tests of an early method to reduce scheming. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/detecting-and-reducing-scheming-in-ai-models

item.title: Introducing Stargate UK
item.description: OpenAI, NVIDIA, and Nscale launch Stargate UK, a sovereign AI infrastructure partnership delivering up to 50,000 GPUs and the UK’s largest supercomputer to power national AI innovation, public services, and economic growth. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/introducing-stargate-uk

item.title: Building towards age prediction
item.description: Learn how OpenAI is building age prediction and parental controls in ChatGPT to create safer, age-appropriate experiences for teens while supporting families with new tools. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/building-towards-age-prediction

item.title: Teen safety, freedom, and privacy
item.description: Explore OpenAI’s approach to balancing teen safety, freedom, and privacy in AI use. Link to article: https://openai.com/index/teen-safety-freedom-and-privacy
